name: Small Kreatures Such As We
description:
...inspired by mold, the most resilient of all organism.
Just like mould, a thin layer, a barely noticeable film has started to form over our minds. It's always been there but the isolation, the loneliness, the uncertainty of this past year has been the fuel, the catalyst for the layer of mould to spread and fester.
At first, we didn't notice it, like the small patch in the corner of our shower.
And suddenly it was everywhere, on the doors, the bathroom floor, our brain and our soul... by the time we noticed it it has spread so far over our thoughts that the only way out was to burn the whole house down.
Mold...depression... tomato...to-mah-toe.
